item.title: 中国承诺在外国批评下在年度贸易博览会上扩大市场准入
item.description:
China will further expand market access and increase imports, its premier told a trade fair in Shanghai on Sunday, amid criticism from European firms who said they wanted to see more tangible improvement in the country's business environment.翻译:中国总理周日在上海举行的一次贸易展览会上表示，中国将进一步扩大市场准入并增加进口，而欧洲企业则表示希望看到中国营商环境得到更切实的改善。

Li Qiang told the opening ceremony of the annual China International Import Expo that the country was committed to opening up its economy, and that imports of goods and services were set to reach a cumulative $17 trillion within the next five years.翻译:李强在一年一度的中国国际进口博览会开幕式上表示，中国致力于开放经济，未来五年货物和服务进口累计将达到17万亿美元。

"No matter how the world changes, China's pace of opening up will never stall, and its determination to share development opportunities with the world will never change," Li said.翻译:李克强表示，无论世界如何变化，中国开放的步伐永远不会停止，与世界分享发展机遇的决心永远不会改变。

China will promote coordinated development of trade in goods and services, protect an international business environment, and relax market access including lifting restrictions on foreign investment in manufacturing, he said.翻译:中国将促进货物贸易和服务贸易协调发展，保护国际营商环境，放宽市场准入，包括取消制造业外资限制。

The import expo was launched by President Xi Jinping in 2018 to promote China's free trade credentials and counter criticism of its trade surplus with many countries. However, participation in the past three years was curtailed by the COVID-19 pandemic.翻译:进口博览会由习近平主席于2018年发起，旨在宣传中国的自由贸易资质，并反驳对其与许多国家的贸易顺差的批评。然而，过去三年的参与因 COVID-19 大流行而减少。

This year's event drew criticism from the European Chamber of Commerce in China on Friday, which branded it a "political showcase" and urged authorities to enact more tangible measures to restore confidence in the country among European businesses.翻译:今年的活动周五遭到中国欧盟商会的批评，该商会称其为“政治展示” ，并敦促当局采取更切实的措施，以恢复欧洲企业对中国的信心。

China's imports have slumped this year amid a slowdown in the world's second largest economy, although data released last month indicated that the downtrend could be starting to ease.翻译:由于世界第二大经济体放缓，中国今年的进口大幅下滑，尽管上个月发布的数据表明下降趋势可能开始放缓。

Li in his speech cited examples of businesses that had benefited from the show - including an Afghan carpet maker and Japanese pharmaceutical firm, though without identifying them - and said out of the roughly 3,400 companies participating this year, over 200 had been repeat attendees for the past six years.翻译:李在演讲中列举了从展会中受益的企业例子，其中包括一家阿富汗地毯制造商和日本制药公司，但没有透露具体名称，并表示，在今年参展的约 3,400 家公司中，有 200 多家是重复参加展会的企业。过去六年。

Countries including Australia and the United States have sent large delegations to the event, which runs over Nov. 5-10. Participants include Micron Technology (MU.O)翻译:）, Nestle (NESN.S)翻译:）, Burberry (BRBY.L)翻译:） and L'Oreal (OREP.PA)翻译:）, state media reported.翻译:澳大利亚和美国等国家派出大型代表团参加了本次活动，活动将于 11 月 5 日至 10 日举行。据官方媒体报道，参与者包括美光科技(MU.O)翻译:） 、雀巢(NESN.S)翻译:） 、巴宝莉(BRBY.L)翻译:）和欧莱雅(OREP.PA)翻译:） 。

On Sunday, Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese, at the start of the first visit to China by a leader of his country in seven years, told the opening ceremony that dialogue and cooperation was "in all our interests".翻译:周日，澳大利亚总理安东尼·艾博内塞在澳大利亚领导人七年来首次访华之际在开幕式上表示，对话与合作“符合我们所有人的利益” 。

Last year, $73.52 billion worth of so-called intentional deals were signed at the fair, up 3.9% from the previous year.翻译:去年，广交会上签订了价值735.2亿美元的意向交易，比上年增长3.9%。

China will "actively promote" its application to join the Comprehensive Progressive Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)翻译:）, Li also said in his speech on Sunday.翻译:李克强在周日的讲话中还表示，中国将“积极推动”申请加入全面进步跨太平洋伙伴关系协定（CPTPP）。

Taiwan, Ukraine, Costa Rica, Uruguay and Ecuador have also applied to join.翻译:台湾、乌克兰、哥斯达黎加、乌拉圭和厄瓜多尔也申请加入。

The CPTPP is a landmark trade pact agreed in 2018 between 11 countries including Australia, Brunei, Canada, Chile, Japan, Malaysia, Mexico, New Zealand, Peru, Singapore and Vietnam.翻译:CPTPP是澳大利亚、文莱、加拿大、智利、日本、马来西亚、墨西哥、新西兰、秘鲁、新加坡和越南等11个国家于2018年达成的具有里程碑意义的贸易协定。

Britain earlier this year became the 12th member of the pact, which cuts trade barriers. China’s application is next in line to be considered by the 12 members if they are dealt with in the order they were received.翻译:英国今年早些时候成为该协议的第12个成员国，该协议旨在削减贸易壁垒。如果中国的申请按照收到的顺序得到处理，那么接下来将由 12 个成员国审议。

Reporting by Brenda Goh in Shanghai and Martin Quin Pollard in Beijing; Editing by Michael Perry and Christopher Cushing翻译:Brenda Goh 在上海和 Martin Quin Pollard 在北京的报道；迈克尔·佩里和克里斯托弗·库欣编辑
item.author: Brenda Goh

item.title: 澳大利亚阿尔巴尼亚人访华寻求对话与合作
item.description:
Australia's Prime Minister Anthony Albanese, starting the first visit to China by a leader of his country in seven years, said on Sunday it was "in all our interests" to have a bilateral relationship with dialogue and cooperation.翻译:澳大利亚总理安东尼·阿尔巴内塞周日开始该国领导人七年来的首次访华，他表示，建立对话与合作的双边关系“符合我们所有人的利益”。

Australia will continue to work constructively with China, he said in a short speech to the annual China International Import Expo in Shanghai, which was opened by Premier Li Qiang.翻译:他在上海举行的一年一度的中国国际进口博览会上发表简短讲话，该博览会由国务院总理李强主持开幕，澳大利亚将继续与中国进行建设性合作。

Albanese is the first Australian leader to visit China since 2016, part of an effort to patch up relations that had deteriorated over several years due to disputes over Chinese telecoms firm Huawei, espionage and COVID-19.翻译:阿尔巴内塞是自 2016 年以来第一位访问中国的澳大利亚领导人，此举是为了修复多年来因中国电信公司华为、间谍活动和新冠病毒 (COVID-19)翻译:） 纠纷而恶化的关系。

After the speech, addressing media alongside Trade Minister Don Farrell, Albanese said he welcomed Li's comments at the Expo and described them as "very positive". Li said China will further expand market access and imports. read more 翻译:演讲结束后，阿尔巴尼斯与贸易部长唐·法雷尔一起向媒体发表讲话，他表示欢迎李克强在世博会上的评论，并称这些评论“非常积极”。李克强表示，中国将进一步扩大市场准入和进口。 阅读更多

Farrell said after meeting with his Chinese counterpart on Saturday he expected impediments on Australian seafood and red meat products to be removed "in a very short space of time".翻译:法雷尔在周六与中国同行会面后表示，他预计澳大利亚海鲜和红肉产品的障碍将“在很短的时间内”消除。

Albanese, in his speech, described the relationship between the two countries as "mature" and said it was "energised by the complementary nature of our economies".翻译:阿尔巴内塞在讲话中将两国关系描述为“成熟”，并表示“两国经济的互补性为两国关系注入了活力”。

"Along with the other economies in our region, Australia and China have prospered thanks to the certainty and stability that is made possible by rules-based trade," Albanese said, according to an official transcript.翻译:根据官方记录，阿尔巴内塞表示：“与我们地区的其他经济体一样，澳大利亚和中国的繁荣得益于基于规则的贸易所带来的确定性和稳定性。”

Albanese's government has worked to stabilise ties with China since coming to office last year, and China has lifted most trade blocks imposed in a 2020 diplomatic dispute that cost A$20 billion in commodity and food exports.翻译:阿尔巴内塞政府自去年上任以来一直致力于稳定与中国的关系，中国已经取消了在 2020 年外交争端中施加的大部分贸易封锁，该争端造成了 200 亿澳元的大宗商品和食品出口损失。

"We continue to highly value the World Trade Organisation, whose role as an independent and respected umpire benefits us all," Albanese said, without directly mentioning any disputes.翻译:“我们继续高度重视世界贸易组织，它作为独立且受人尊敬的裁判的角色使我们所有人受益，”阿尔巴内塞说，但没有直接提及任何争议。

Albanese, on Monday, will meet President Xi Jinping in Beijing, where the prime minister has said he will raise concerns over rising tensions in the South China Sea.翻译:阿尔巴内塞周一将在北京会见国家主席习近平，习近平表示他将提出对南海紧张局势升级的担忧。

On arriving in Shanghai late on Saturday, Albanese said it was in Australia's interests to have a positive and constructive dialogue with its major trading partner.翻译:阿尔巴尼斯于周六晚抵达上海时表示，与其主要贸易伙伴进行积极和建设性的对话符合澳大利亚的利益。

Albanese said on Saturday, before leaving for China, that the much-anticipated visit to meet with Xi and Li marked a "very positive step" in stabilising strained bilateral ties.翻译:阿尔巴内塞周六在启程前往中国之前表示，这次备受期待的会见习近平和李克强的访问标志着稳定紧张的双边关系的“非常积极的一步”。

Reporting by Brenda Goh, Martin Quin Pollard and Sam McKeith; Editing by William Mallard and Michael Perry翻译:Brenda Goh、Martin Quin Pollard 和 Sam McKeith 报道；威廉·马拉德和迈克尔·佩里编辑
item.author: Brenda Goh

item.title: 赞帕对全能表现的满意帮助澳大利亚击败了英格兰
item.description:
Spinner Adam Zampa called his player of the match performance against England on Saturday his "most satisfying" One Day International, as Australia won by 33 runs to move to the cusp of qualifying for the Cricket World Cup semi-finals.翻译:纺纱员亚当·赞帕称他周六对阵英格兰队的比赛最佳球员的表现是他“最满意的”单日国际比赛，澳大利亚队以 33 分的优势获胜，进入了板球世界杯半决赛的资格赛。

Zampa claimed the key wickets of Jos Buttler, Ben Stokes and Moeen Ali for 21 runs in Ahmedabad while also hitting 29 runs off 19 balls and making a diving outfield catch in a remarkable all-round display.翻译:赞帕在艾哈迈达巴德拿下乔斯·巴特勒、本·斯托克斯和莫恩·阿里的关键三柱门，取得 21 分，同时还以 19 个球打出 29 分，并在外野接球，展现出非凡的全面表现。

The 31-year-old's show helped move the Australians into third place in the standings, with Zampa and his team mates still to play Afghanistan and Bangladesh in the group phase.翻译:这位31岁球员的表现帮助澳大利亚队在积分榜上升至第三位，赞帕和他的队友们仍在小组赛中对阵阿富汗和孟加拉国。

The top four finishers will advance to the semi-finals.翻译:前四名选手将晋级半决赛。

"It's probably the most satisfying ODI I've ever played to be honest," said Zampa, who now sits on top of the tournament wicket-taking charts.翻译:“说实话，这可能是我玩过的最令人满意的 ODI，”现在位居锦标赛三柱门排行榜榜首的赞帕说道。

"To be able to contribute with the bat – Starcy and I spoke about trying to take it deep, still staying fairly positive, because we stuffed it up against New Zealand (getting bowled out with four balls to spare)翻译:）.翻译:“为了能够用球棒做出贡献——斯塔西和我谈到了要努力把球打得更深，但仍然保持相当积极的态度，因为我们在对阵新西兰的比赛中把球棒塞满了（在还有四个球的情况下被淘汰）。

"The catch – I am not known as the best fielder in the world, but satisfying to work on stuff and when things come off like that, it's a good feeling."翻译:“问题是——我并不被认为是世界上最好的外野手，但我对做事感到满意，当事情像这样进展时，感觉很好。”

Marnus Labuschagne top scored with 71 as Australia were all out for 286, but the English fell short in the clash with their Ashes rivals, hitting 253 to slump to their sixth loss in seven matches to stay rooted to the bottom of the table.翻译:马努斯·拉布沙涅 (Marnus Labuschagne)翻译:） 打出 71 杆，澳大利亚队以 286 杆出局，但英格兰队在与灰烬杯对手的比赛中表现不佳，打出 253 杆，在七场比赛中第六次失利，继续稳居积分榜垫底。

"Buttler felt like a really big wicket and then I think they needed 130-odd off 100 balls and (when)翻译:） Stokes, Moeen Ali get on a roll, they cruise that really," said Zampa.翻译:“巴特勒感觉就像一个非常大的三柱门，然后我认为他们需要 100 个球中的 130 多个球，并且（当）斯托克斯、莫恩·阿里上场时，他们真的会巡航，”赞帕说。

"(The ball to dismiss)翻译:） Moeen Ali; I'm known for bowling flatter and faster, but...to be able to bowl it slower and bring it back a little bit was also a really satisfying wicket."翻译:“（要解雇的球）莫恩·阿里；我以更平和更快的保龄球而闻名，但是......能够更慢地投球并将其带回来一点也是一个非常令人满意的三柱门。”

Reporting by Michael Church, Editing by Michael Perry翻译:迈克尔·丘奇报道，迈克尔·佩里编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 据新华社报道，国家副主席韩正会见博世董事长哈同
item.description:
China's Vice-president Han Zheng met Bosch Ltd (BOSH.NS)翻译:） Chairman Stefan Hartung in Beijing on Friday, state news agency Xinhua reported.翻译:据官方通讯社新华社报道，中国国家副主席韩正周五在北京会见了博世有限公司（BOSH.NS）董事长斯特凡·哈同（Stefan Hartung）。

Han said economic and trade cooperation has always been the "ballast stone" of China-Germany relations, and China welcomes multinational companies such as Bosch, Xinhua reported.翻译:据新华社报道，韩正表示，经贸合作一直是中德关系的“压舱石”，中方欢迎博世等跨国企业。

Chinese President Xi Jinping told German Chancellor Olaf Scholz through a video link on Friday that cooperation between China and Germany has become more robust, solid and dynamic.翻译:中国国家主席习近平周五通过视频连线向德国总理肖尔茨表示，中德合作更加强劲、扎实、富有活力。

Reporting by Shanghai Newsroom; editing by Jason Neely翻译:上海新闻编辑室报道；杰森·尼利编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 尽管反对，香港仍举办亚洲首届同性恋运动会
item.description:
The Gay Games Hong Kong (GGHK)翻译:） kicked off on Saturday, its first time in Asia, despite opposition from anti-LGBTQ lawmakers and human rights activists.

The opening ceremony began with a march-in by the GGHK, Federation of Gay Games, and delegations from around the world, followed by performances including the Hong Kong lion dance.翻译:开幕式以GGHK、同性恋运动总会和来自世界各地的代表团的入场仪式拉开序幕，随后进行了包括香港舞狮在内的表演。

"The vision of the Gay Games has always been to create a sports, arts, and culture festival that celebrates participation, inclusion, and personal best," said Lisa Lam, co-chair of GGHK.翻译:GGHK 联合主席林丽莎 (Lisa Lam) 表示：“同性恋运动会的愿景始终是打造一个体育、艺术和文化节日，庆祝参与、包容和个人最佳表现。”

Lam said GGHK was proud to introduce an all-genders category in multi-sports for the first time, so that people of all genders can compete together.翻译:林表示，GGHK很荣幸能够首次在综合运动项目中引入不分性别的类别，让所有性别的人都可以一起竞争。

Over 2,300 participants from 45 countries are expected to take part in sporting and cultural events, including, dragon boat racing and mahjong.翻译:预计将有来自 45 个国家的 2,300 多名参与者参加龙舟赛和麻将等体育和文化活动。

The Mexican city of Guadalajara is co-hosting the event.翻译:墨西哥城瓜达拉哈拉是该活动的共同主办者。

Hong Kong has no law against discrimination based on sexual orientation and does not recognise same-sex marriage.翻译:香港没有针对性取向歧视的法律，也不承认同性婚姻。

A ruling by its top court in September set a two-year deadline for the government to establish a legal framework to recognise same-sex unions.翻译:最高法院九月份的一项裁决为政府设定了两年的期限，以建立承认同性婚姻的法律框架。

The government did not send officials to the opening ceremony, warning the organisers in August that the Games must be conducted in a “lawful, safe and orderly manner”.翻译:政府没有派官员参加开幕式，并在八月份警告组织者，奥运会必须“合法、安全和有序”进行。

Beijing imposed the National Security Law (NSL)翻译:） on the city in 2020 after months of anti-government protests. The law punishes subversion, collusion with foreign forces and terrorism with terms of up to life in prison.翻译:经过数月的反政府抗议活动后，北京于 2020 年在该市实施了《国家安全法》(NSL)翻译:）。该法对颠覆、勾结外国势力和恐怖主义行为的处罚最高可达终身监禁。

Regina Ip, convener of the city’s top decision-making body the Executive Council, was the only pro-establishment figure at the opening ceremony, despite calls from anti-LGBTQ lawmakers for her to resign.翻译:香港最高决策机构行政会议召集人叶刘淑仪是开幕式上唯一的亲建制人士，尽管反 LGBTQ 议员呼吁她辞职。

"The holding of the Gay Games in Hong Kong is strong testimony to the diversity, inclusion, and unity of our city," Ip said in her welcoming speech.翻译:叶女士在欢迎辞中表示：“同性恋运动会在香港举行，有力地证明了我们城市的多样性、包容性和团结。”

"Equal opportunity and non-discrimination are highly treasured by our government and our people."翻译:“我们的政府和人民高度重视机会平等和非歧视。”

Pro-Beijing lawmaker Junius Ho on Thursday sent a letter to the city's leader John Lee, saying that the agenda of the gay games is to promote same-sex marriage, accusing it of violating the NSL.翻译:亲北京议员何君尧周四致信香港领导人李约翰，称同性恋运动会的议程是促进同性婚姻，并指责其违反了国家安全法。

Five Hong Kong human rights activists also called for the Games to be cancelled in June, saying organisers "have aligned themselves with pro-authoritarian figures responsible for widespread persecution against the people of Hong Kong".翻译:五名香港人权活动人士也呼吁取消六月份的奥运会，称组织者“与对香港人民进行广泛迫害的亲独裁人士结盟”。

Taiwan is not sending athletes to Hong Kong but to Guadalajara, citing security concerns over the NSL.翻译:台湾以国家超级联赛的安全考虑为由，不会派运动员前往香港，而是前往瓜达拉哈拉。

Opposition did not dampen the excitement, spectators chanted, cheered and waved before the opening ceremony.翻译:反对声并没有浇灭观众们的兴奋，开幕式前观众们高呼口号、欢呼雀跃、挥手致意。

“This is a good idea because especially China is not very fond of the gays. So this is to become visible in China as queer people,” said Gerrit Schulz, 80, a participant from Berlin.翻译:“这是个好主意，因为尤其是中国不太喜欢同性恋。因此，这将在中国以酷儿的身份出现，”来自柏林的 80 岁参与者格里特·舒尔茨 (Gerrit Schulz) 说道。

Reporting by Jessie Pang and Dorothy Kam; Editing by Giles Elgood翻译:Jessie Pang 和 Dorothy Kam 的报道；贾尔斯·埃尔古德编辑
item.author: Jessie Pang, Dorothy Kam

item.title: 中国工商银行前副总裁接受反腐调查
item.description:
The former vice president of the Industrial and Commercial Bank of China (ICBC)翻译:） (601398.SS)翻译:）, Zhang Hongli, is being probed by the anti-graft body, the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection said on Saturday.翻译:中央纪委国家监委周六表示，中国工商银行（ICBC） （601398.SS）原副行长张红利正接受反腐调查。

Reporting by Shanghai Newsroom; Editing by William Mallard翻译:上海新闻编辑室报道；威廉·马拉德编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国基本养老基金2022年投资收益为0.33%
item.description:
The basic pension fund managed by China's social security fund gained 5.1 billion yuan, or 0.33% in 2022, down from a 4.9% gain in 2021, the National Council for Social Security Fund said on Saturday.翻译:全国社会保障基金理事会周六表示，2022年中国社会保障基金管理的基本养老基金增长51亿元人民币，增长0.33%，低于2021年的4.9%的增长。

The shrink in yield was mainly impacted by deep changes in global economic and political situations and increasing fluctuations in the financial markets, the state investor said in a statement.翻译:该国有投资者在一份声明中表示，收益率下降主要是受全球经济和政治形势深刻变化以及金融市场波动加剧的影响。

China's stock benchmark CSI 300 (.CSI300)翻译:） lost 21.6% in 2022 and so far this year is down 7.4%.

The basic pension fund manages a total 1.62 trillion yuan by the end of 2022, and has posed an annual average gain of 5.4% since the end of 2016, when the national social security fund started to manage the pension's investment.翻译:截至2022年底，基本养老基金管理规模达1.62万亿元，自2016年底全国社保基金开始管理养老金投资以来，年均收益达5.4%。

Separately, the national social security fund reported a 5.07%, or 138 billion yuan loss for the year of 2022, it said in a report in September.翻译:另外，全国社保基金在 9 月份的一份报告中称，2022 年全年亏损 5.07%，即 1380 亿元。

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^>翻译:^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ ^^^^^^^^^^^^^>

)翻译:）

Reporting by Shanghai Newsroom; Editing by Michael Perry翻译:上海新闻编辑室报道；迈克尔·佩里编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 澳大利亚总理称中国访问对双边关系“非常积极”
item.description:
Australia's Prime Minister Anthony Albanese said on Saturday his much-anticipated visit to China to meet with President Xi Jinping and Premier Li Qiang marks a "very positive step" in stabilising strained bilateral ties.翻译:澳大利亚总理安东尼·艾博内塞周六表示，他备受期待的访华之旅与习近平主席和李强总理会面，标志着稳定紧张双边关系的“非常积极的一步”。

Arriving on Saturday, Albanese will be the first Australian leader to visit China since 2016, part of an effort to patch up relations that had deteriorated over several years due to disputes over Chinese telecoms firm Huawei, espionage and COVID-19.翻译:阿尔巴内塞于周六抵达，将成为自 2016 年以来第一位访问中国的澳大利亚领导人，此举是为了修复多年来因中国电信公司华为、间谍活动和新冠病毒 (COVID-19)翻译:） 争端而恶化的关系。

"The fact that is it is the first visit in seven years to our major trading partner is a very positive step, and I look forward to constructive discussions and dialogue with President Xi and the Premier Li during my visit," Albanese said in Darwin, the capital of Australia's Northern Territory.翻译:阿尔巴尼斯在达尔文表示：“这是七年来首次访问我们的主要贸易伙伴，这是非常积极的一步，我期待在访问期间与习主席和李总理进行建设性讨论和对话。”澳大利亚北领地首府。

"It is a result of the patient, calibrated and deliberate approach that we have to the relationship with China."翻译:“这是我们对与中国的关系采取耐心、谨慎和审慎态度的结果。”

Albanese's government has taken credit for stabilising ties with China since coming to office last year. China has lifted most trade blocks imposed in a 2020 diplomatic dispute that cost A$20 billion in commodity and food exports.翻译:自去年上任以来，阿尔巴尼斯政府因稳定与中国的关系而受到赞誉。中国取消了 2020 年外交争端中施加的大部分贸易封锁，该争端导致大宗商品和食品出口损失 200 亿澳元。

The Australian leader is to attend China's top imports fair in Shanghai, to be opened by Li, on Sunday. He will meet Xi in Beijing on Monday, where the prime minister has said he will raise concerns over rising tensions in the South China Sea.翻译:澳大利亚领导人将于周日出席在上海举行的中国顶级进口博览会，该博览会将由李克强主持开幕。他将于周一在北京会见习近平，习近平表示他将表达对南海紧张局势升级的担忧。

He said he would also raise the case of Australian writer Yang Hengjun, jailed in Beijing for four years on espionage charges. "The case needs to be resolved," Albanese told reporters on Saturday.翻译:他表示，他还将提及澳大利亚作家杨恒均的案件，杨恒均因间谍罪名在北京被判入狱四年。 “此案需要解决，”阿尔巴内塞周六告诉记者。

He will be joined in Beijing by Foreign Minister Penny Wong before she makes a stopover in Tokyo for talks on the sidelines of a Group of Seven meeting, Wong's office said.翻译:黄英贤的办公室称，外交部长黄英贤将在北京与他会面，然后她将在东京中途停留，在七国集团会议期间进行会谈。

Reporting by Sam McKeith in Sydney翻译:Sam McKeith 悉尼报道
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 美国向中国表达对南海“危险且非法”行动的担忧
item.description:
The United States and China held "candid" talks on maritime issues on Friday, including on the contested South China Sea, and the U.S. side underscored its concerns about "dangerous and unlawful" Chinese actions there, the U.S. State Department said.翻译:美国国务院表示，美国和中国周五就海事问题（包括有争议的南海问题）举行了“坦诚”会谈，美方强调了对中国在那里“危险和非法”行动的担忧。

The talks took place in Beijing between the department's China Coordinator Mark Lambert and China's Director-General for Boundary and Ocean Affairs Hong Liang, the State Department said in a statement.翻译:美国国务院在一份声明中称，国务院中国事务协调员马克·兰伯特和中国边界与海洋事务司司长洪亮在北京举行了会谈。

The meeting follows recent high-level diplomacy ahead of an expected meeting between U.S. President Joe Biden and Chinese President Xi Jinping on the sidelines of the mid November APEC summit in San Francisco.翻译:这次会议是在美国总统乔·拜登和中国国家主席习近平预计将于 11 月中旬旧金山亚太经合组织峰会期间举行会晤之前进行的高层外交活动之后举行的。

The U.S. statement said the talks were part of "efforts to maintain open lines of communication and responsibly manage the U.S.-China relationship" and that the U.S. side reiterated the need to resume military-military channels, "to avoid miscommunication and miscalculation."翻译:美国声明称，会谈是“保持开放沟通渠道和负责任地管理美中关系的努力的一部分”，美方重申有必要恢复军事渠道，“以避免沟通不畅和误判”。

It described the talks as "substantive, constructive, and candid" and said they covered a range of maritime issues, including the South China Sea and East China Sea, which are contested by China and other nations.翻译:声明称此次会谈“具有实质性、建设性和坦诚”，并表示会谈涵盖了一系列海洋问题，包括中国和其他国家存在争议的南海和东海问题。

"The United States underscored concerns with the PRC's dangerous and unlawful actions in the South China Sea," it said, referring to the People's Republic of China.翻译:“美国强调了对中国在南海的危险和非法行为的担忧，”它说，指的是中华人民共和国。

Such actions included China's obstruction of an Oct. 22 Philippine resupply mission at Second Thomas Shoal and its "unsafe" intercept of a U.S. aircraft on Oct. 24, the statement said.翻译:声明称，此类行动包括中国阻挠菲律宾10月22日在仁爱礁执行补给任务，以及10月24日“不安全”拦截美国飞机。

China said on Monday after a visit by Foreign Minister Wang Yi to Washington that the U.S. and China would hold "consultations on arms control and non-proliferation" in the coming days, as well as separate talks on maritime affairs and other issues.翻译:中国周一在外交部长王毅访问华盛顿后表示，美国和中国将在未来几天举行“军控和防扩散磋商”，并就海洋事务和其他问题举行单独会谈。

A State Department spokesperson said the U.S. Assistant Secretary for Arms Control Mallory Stewart would host Sun Xiaobo, head of the arms-control department at China's Foreign Ministry, at the State Department next week.翻译:美国国务院发言人表示，美国负责军控的助理国务卿马洛里·斯图尔特下周将在国务院接待中国外交部军控司司长孙晓波。

"We have continually called on the PRC to substantively engage on arms control issues and reducing strategic risk," the spokesperson said, a reference to U.S. concerns about China's nuclear weapons build-up and frustration that Beijing has shown little interest in discussing this.翻译:这位发言人表示：“我们不断呼吁中国实质性地参与军控问题并降低战略风险。”他指的是美国对中国核武器集结的担忧，以及北京方面对讨论这一问题兴趣不大的不满。

A flurry of diplomatic engagements in recent months, largely at Washington's request, has sought to salvage what were rapidly deteriorating ties between the two countries following the U.S. downing in February of a suspected Chinese spy balloon.翻译:近几个月来，主要是应华盛顿的要求，一系列外交活动试图挽救自美国二月份击落疑似中国间谍气球以来两国之间迅速恶化的关系。

While Biden and Xi are expected to meet this month, China has yet to confirm this and a senior Biden administration official said on Tuesday important details have yet to be hammered out.翻译:虽然拜登和习近平预计将于本月会面，但中国尚未证实这一点， 拜登政府高级官员周二表示，重要细节尚未敲定。

Reporting by David Brunnstrom; Editing by Sandra Maler and David Gregorio翻译:大卫·布伦斯特罗姆报道；桑德拉·马勒和大卫·格雷戈里奥编辑
item.author: David Brunnstrom

item.title: 独家：英国不承认中国参加领导人人工智能会议
item.description:
China said it attended a top-level ministerial meeting at the UK AI Safety Summit on Thursday, despite not being listed by Britain among the "like-minded" participants and not featuring in official handshakes or the family photograph.翻译:中国表示，它参加了周四在英国人工智能安全峰会上举行的最高级别部长级会议，尽管英国没有将其列为“志同道合”的与会者，也没有出现在官方握手或家庭照片中。

China's absence sparked questions because it participated in the first day of the two-day summit on the safety of "frontier" artificial intelligence, and Britain declined to say why Beijing was not among those joining the second day's senior meeting.翻译:中国的缺席引发了质疑，因为它参加了为期两天的“前沿”人工智能安全峰会的第一天，而英国拒绝透露为什么北京没有参加第二天的高级会议。

China's delegate to the meeting, Vice Minister of Science and Technology Wu Zhaohui, was present on Thursday, his ministry said on Friday. China's participation in the second-day ministerial meeting has not been previously reported.翻译:中国科技部周五表示，中国出席会议的代表、科技部副部长吴朝晖周四出席了会议。此前尚未有中国参加第二天部长级会议的报道。

"Please contact the British sponsoring government department for the specific arrangements and outcomes of the meeting," the Chinese ministry said when asked why Wu had not featured in the public events on Thursday.翻译:当被问及吴为什么没有出席周四的公开活动时，中国外交部表示：“会议的具体安排和成果请与英国主办政府部门联系。”

In one possible reason for not advertising the Chinese presence, Britain's Deputy Prime Minister Oliver Dowden told Bloomberg TV on Wednesday that "there are some sessions where we have like-minded countries working together, so it might not be appropriate for China to join".翻译:英国副首相奥利弗·道登周三对彭博电视台表示，不宣传中国参与的一个可能原因是，“在某些会议上，我们有志同道合的国家共同努力，因此中国参加可能不合适”。

Among other reasons speculated was that Britain wanted to present a united front and China did not back Thursday's joint agreement.翻译:推测的其他原因之一是英国希望建立统一战线，而中国不支持周四的联合协议。

The Chinese technology ministry declined to say why China did not agree to the proposal, which was about AI model testing.翻译:中国科技部拒绝透露中国为何不同意该提案，该提案涉及人工智能模型测试。

Diplomatic protocol may have played a part too because Wu was junior to other participants on the second day of the conference in Bletchley Park, southern England.翻译:外交礼节可能也发挥了作用，因为在英格兰南部布莱奇利公园举行的会议第二天，吴比其他与会者资历浅。

British Prime Minister Rishi Sunak chaired Thursday's meeting that comprised "a small group of like-minded senior representatives from governments around the world", Britain said, including the U.S. vice president and the EC president.翻译:英国表示，英国首相苏纳克主持了周四的会议，会议由“来自世界各国政府的一小群志同道合的高级代表”组成，其中包括美国副总统和欧盟主席。

Some British lawmakers had criticised China's participation in the inaugural AI summit. They questioned whether Beijing, which the West sees as a technological rival and military threat, should be included in meetings about sensitive technology.翻译:一些英国议员批评中国参加首届人工智能峰会。他们质疑被西方视为技术竞争对手和军事威胁的北京是否应该参加有关敏感技术的会议。

Wu attended the first day of the summit on Wednesday when China, the United States, European Union and 26 other countries agreed to share a common approach to identifying AI risks and ways to mitigate them, called the Bletchley Declaration.翻译:周三，吴出席了峰会的第一天，当时中国、美国、欧盟和其他 26 个国家同意采用共同的方法来识别人工智能风险和减轻风险的方法，即《布莱切利宣言》。

He did not feature in any public events on the second day, leading one journalist to ask Sunak at a news conference why China had been excluded from the final day.翻译:他没有参加第二天的任何公共活动，导致一名记者在新闻发布会上询问苏纳克为什么中国被排除在最后一天之外。

Sunak did not address the question directly, but said he achieved the outcome he wanted, with China engaged in the process.翻译:苏纳克没有直接回答这个问题，但表示他实现了他想要的结果，而中国也参与了这一过程。

A British government spokesperson declined to comment on the participation of individual countries at the summit.翻译:英国政府发言人拒绝就个别国家参加峰会的情况发表评论。

Sunak told reporters: "Some said we shouldn't even invite China, others said we would never get an agreement with them. Both were wrong."翻译:苏纳克对记者说：“有些人说我们甚至不应该邀请中国，另一些人说我们永远不会与他们达成协议。两者都错了。”

Reporting by Paul Sandle in London and Brenda Goh in Shanghai, additional reporting by Alistair Smout; Editing by Cynthia Osterman翻译:Paul Sandle 在伦敦和 Brenda Goh 在上海的报道，Alistair Smout 的补充报道；辛西娅·奥斯特曼编辑
item.author: Brenda Goh, Paul Sandle

item.title: 中国喷气式飞机在国际水域威胁加拿大直升机机组人员 - 渥太华
item.description:
Chinese warplanes buzzed a Canadian helicopter over international waters in the South China Sea last weekend and then fired flares at it, Defence Minister Bill Blair said on Friday, saying the incidents had put the crew in danger.翻译:国防部长比尔·布莱尔周五表示，中国战机上周末在南海国际水域上空盘旋一架加拿大直升机，然后向其发射照明弹，称这些事件使机组人员处于危险之中。

His comments marked the second time in two weeks that Canada has accused China's air force of unsafe behavior. In mid-October, Blair said a Chinese jet had come within five meters (16 feet)翻译:） of a surveillance plane taking part in a U.N. operation to enforce sanctions against North Korea.翻译:他的言论标志着加拿大两周内第二次指责中国空军的不安全行为。十月中旬，布莱尔表示，一架中国喷气式飞机距离一架参加联合国对朝鲜实施制裁行动的侦察机不到五米（16英尺） 。

Blair said a Chinese jet had initially flown right over the helicopter on Sunday, causing it to experience significant turbulence. Later that day another jet launched flares directly in front of the helicopter, forcing it to swerve to avoid being hit.翻译:布莱尔表示，周日一架中国喷气式飞机最初飞过这架直升机，导致直升机经历了严重的湍流。当天晚些时候，另一架喷气式飞机直接向直升机前方发射照明弹，迫使直升机转向以避免被击中。

"These maneuvers put the safety of all personnel involved in unnecessary risk," he told reporters, saying Ottawa considered the recent actions by Chinese jets to be "significantly unsafe".翻译:他对记者表示：“这些演习使所有相关人员的安全面临不必要的风险。”他表示，渥太华认为中国飞机最近的行动“非常不安全”。

The Chinese embassy in Ottawa was not immediately available for comment. In the wake of the mid-October incident, Beijing said the Canadian plane had violated China's sovereignty.翻译:记者未能立即联系到中国驻渥太华大使馆置评。十月中旬事件发生后，北京表示加拿大飞机侵犯了中国主权。

In May, the Pentagon said a Chinese fighter jet carried out an "unnecessarily aggressive" maneuver near a U.S. military plane over the South China Sea in international airspace. The encounter followed what Washington calls a recent trend of increasingly dangerous behavior by Chinese military aircraft.翻译:五角大楼五角大楼表示，一架中国战斗机在南海国际空域的一架美国军机附近进行了“不必要的侵略性”机动。这次遭遇是在华盛顿所说的中国军机最近出现的日益危险的行为趋势之后发生的。

Reporting by David Ljunggren, editing by Steve Scherer and Andrew Cawthorne翻译:大卫·永格伦 (David Ljunggren)翻译:） 报道，史蒂夫·谢勒 (Steve Scherer)翻译:） 和安德鲁·考索恩 (Andrew Cawthorne)翻译:） 编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 澳大利亚和中国：恢复贸易和访问的道路崎岖
item.description:
Prime Minister Anthony Albanese will on Saturday become the first Australian leader to visit China in seven years, arriving after a period of badly strained relations with the aim of improving dialogue and stabilising ties.翻译:澳大利亚总理安东尼·阿尔巴内塞将于周六成为七年来第一位访问中国的澳大利亚领导人，他在经历了一段严重紧张的关系之后抵达中国，目的是改善对话和稳定关系。

But difficult issues remain between the major trading partners and Albanese said he would raise concerns over rising tension in the South China Sea in a meeting with President Xi Jinping in Beijing on Monday.翻译:但主要贸易伙伴之间仍存在棘手问题，阿尔巴尼斯表示，他将在周一与国家主席习近平在北京会晤时提出对南海紧张局势升级的担忧。

Following is a timeline of relations between Australia and China over recent years.翻译:以下是近年来澳大利亚与中国关系的时间表。

Nov. 17, 2014 - Australia sealed a landmark free trade agreement with top trade partner China, concluding a decade of negotiations. It comes into effect in late 2015.翻译:2014年11月17日——澳大利亚与最大贸易伙伴中国签署了具有里程碑意义的自由贸易协定，结束了长达十年的谈判。该法案将于 2015 年底生效。

Dec. 5, 2017 - Australia, concerned about Chinese influence, announces ban on foreign political donations to prevent external interference in its politics.翻译:2017年12月5日——担心中国影响力的澳大利亚宣布禁止外国政治捐款，以防止外部干涉其政治。

Aug. 23, 2018 - Australia bans Huawei Technologies Co Ltd from supplying equipment for its planned 5G broadband network, citing national security regulations.翻译:2018 年 8 月 23 日 - 澳大利亚以国家安全法规为由，禁止华为技术有限公司为其计划中的 5G 宽带网络提供设备。

April 2020 - Australia seeks support for an international inquiry into the origins of the COVID-19 pandemic. China's then ambassador to Australia says that in response to the call, the Chinese public would boycott Australian wine, beef and tourism.翻译:2020 年 4 月 - 澳大利亚寻求支持对 COVID-19 大流行的起源进行国际调查。时任中国驻澳大利亚大使表示，响应号召，中国公众将抵制澳大利亚葡萄酒、牛肉和旅游业。

June 9, 2020 - China urges students going overseas to think carefully before choosing Australia, citing racist incidents, threatening a $27.5 billion market for educating foreign students.翻译:2020年6月9日 - 中国以种族主义事件为由，敦促出国留学的学生在选择澳大利亚之前慎重考虑，威胁到275亿美元的外国学生教育市场。

August 2020 - Australian citizen Cheng Lei, a business anchor for Chinese state television in Beijing, is detained.翻译:2020 年 8 月 - 澳大利亚公民成雷，北京中国国家电视台商业主播被拘留。

Nov. 27, 2020 - China will impose temporary anti-dumping tariffs on Australian wine, China announces. Shipments of Australian live lobsters, timber and barley are also blocked or restricted around this time. China's embassy lists 14 grievances with Australia, including the blocking of 10 Chinese investments on national security grounds.翻译:2020年11月27日——中国宣布对澳大利亚葡萄酒征收临时反倾销关税。澳大利亚活龙虾、木材和大麦的运输也在此时被封锁或限制。中国大使馆列出了对澳大利亚的14项不满，其中包括以国家安全为由阻止10项中国投资。

December 2020 - Australia raises concern at WTO meeting about China's measures to restrict or ban shipments of Australian barley, wine, meat, dairy, live seafood, logs, timber, coal and cotton.翻译:2020 年 12 月 - 澳大利亚在世贸组织会议上对中国限制或禁止运输澳大利亚大麦、葡萄酒、肉类、乳制品、活海鲜、原木、木材、煤炭和棉花的措施表示担忧。

May 22, 2022 - Australia's Labor Party, led by Albanese, ends almost a decade of conservative rule with a general election victory.翻译:2022 年 5 月 22 日 - 阿尔巴内塞领导的澳大利亚工党以大选胜利结束了近十年的保守派统治。

Nov. 15, 2022 - Albanese meets President Xi Jinping on sidelines of G20 in Indonesia, first leaders' meeting since 2016.翻译:2022 年 11 月 15 日 - 阿尔巴内塞在印度尼西亚举行的 G20 峰会期间会见了习近平主席，这是自 2016 年以来的首次领导人会议。

Dec. 21, 2022 - Foreign Minister Penny Wong in Beijing for first formal talks in China since 2018.翻译:2022 年 12 月 21 日 - 外交部长黄英贤在北京举行自 2018 年以来首次在华正式会谈。

Jan. 3, 2023 - China allows three government-backed utilities and its top steelmaker to resume coal imports from Australia.翻译:2023 年 1 月 3 日 - 中国允许三个政府支持的公用事业公司及其最大的钢铁制造商恢复从澳大利亚进口煤炭。

May 11 - Australia's Trade Minister Don Farrell arrives in Beijing for talks on removal of trade barriers.翻译:5月11日，澳大利亚贸易部长唐·法雷尔抵达北京就消除贸易壁垒进行会谈。

Aug. 5 - China ends 80.5% tariffs on Australian barley.翻译:8 月 5 日——中国终止对澳大利亚大麦征收 80.5% 的关税。

Sept. 7 - Albanese meets Premier Li Qiang on sidelines of East Asia Summit in Indonesia.翻译:9月7日——阿尔巴内斯在印度尼西亚东亚峰会期间会见了李强总理。

Oct. 11 - China releases Australian journalist Cheng Lei after three years in a Beijing prison on national security charges.翻译:10 月 11 日 - 中国释放了因国家安全罪名被关押在北京监狱三年的澳大利亚记者成雷。

Oct. 21 - Australia gives green light to Chinese company Landbridge's 99-year lease on Port of Darwin after security review.翻译:10月21日——经过安全审查，澳大利亚批准中国公司岚桥集团在达尔文港的99年租约。

Oct. 22 - China agrees to review dumping tariffs of 218% on Australian wine, potentially clearing way for the resumption of imports. Australia pauses WTO complaint.翻译:10 月 22 日——中国同意对澳大利亚葡萄酒征收 218% 的倾销关税进行复审，这可能为恢复进口扫清道路。澳大利亚暂停向世贸组织申诉。

Reporting by Kirsty Needham; editing by Robert Birsel翻译:科斯蒂·李约瑟报道；罗伯特·伯塞尔编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中钢协称欧盟碳税构成新贸易壁垒，呼吁加强谈判
item.description:
The Carbon Border Adjustment Mechanism (CBAM)翻译:） proposed by the European Union creates a new trade barrier for Chinese exports, China's state-backed steel association said on Friday, calling for more talks with the bloc to address climate issues.翻译:中国国家支持的钢铁协会周五表示，欧盟提出的碳边境调整机制（CBAM）为中国出口设置了新的贸易壁垒，呼吁与欧盟进行更多谈判以解决气候问题。

The EU approved in April the world's first plan to impose a levy on high-carbon goods imports from 2026, targeting imports of steel, cement, aluminium, fertilisers, electricity, and hydrogen.翻译:欧盟于4月批准了全球首个计划，从2026年起对高碳商品进口征税，针对钢铁、水泥、铝、化肥、电力和氢气的进口。

The levy would pose a big threat to steel producers in China, the world's top exporter of steel, as long as their production remains more carbon-intensive than in the EU.翻译:只要中国这个全球最大钢铁出口国的生产碳排放量仍然高于欧盟，这项征税将对中国钢铁生产商构成巨大威胁。

The new regime entered a trial stage in October, requiring importers of goods into the EU only to report carbon emissions embedded in those products.翻译:新制度于十月进入试行阶段，要求欧盟货物进口商仅报告这些产品中包含的碳排放量。

A fee will be required from 2026 when it is fully in force.翻译:2026 年全面生效后，将收取费用。

The carbon border levy aims to put EU industries and foreign competitors on a level footing, to prevent EU producers relocating to regions with less stringent environmental rules.翻译:碳边境税旨在让欧盟工业和外国竞争对手处于平等地位，防止欧盟生产商迁移到环境规则不太严格的地区。

However, it will also raise costs of steel products shipped to the EU, weakening China's price competitiveness.翻译:但同时也会提高输往欧盟的钢材成本，削弱中国的价格竞争力。

"The EU's unilateral establishment of CBAM is in essence a new trade barrier created under the auspice of low carbon," the China Iron and Steel Association (CISA)翻译:） said.翻译:中国钢铁工业协会表示：“欧盟单方面设立CBAM，本质上是在低碳理念下设置的新贸易壁垒。”

CISA's comments came in response to a query from Reuters sent in September, ahead of the start of the initial phase of the CBAM.翻译:CISA 的评论是为了回应路透社 9 月份在 CBAM 初始阶段开始之前发出的询问。

CBAM does not take into account varying stages of development in different countries and goes against the principle of "common but differentiated responsibilities", the association said.翻译:该协会表示，CBAM没有考虑到不同国家的不同发展阶段，违背了“共同但有区别的责任”原则。

"Once other countries take reciprocal and similar trade protection measures to safeguard their interests, it will result in higher trading costs and mounting risks of trade friction," CISA said.翻译:“一旦其他国家采取对等、类似的贸易保护措施来维护自身利益，就会导致贸易成本上升，贸易摩擦风险加大。”中钢协表示。

"We hope the EU could carefully consider cost and operational challenges posed to its downstream steel consumers due to the change in import structure and engage in more communication with all relevant parties to address climate challenges together," it added.翻译:“我们希望欧盟认真考虑进口结构变化给下游钢铁消费者带来的成本和运营挑战，并与各方加强沟通，共同应对气候挑战。”

The scheme will likely increase China's export costs of steel products by between 4% and 6%, Jiang Wei, the association's vice chairman, told reporters at a quarterly briefing in late October.翻译:该协会副会长姜伟在10月底的季度简报中对记者表示，该计划可能会使中国钢铁产品的出口成本增加4%至6%。

Consultancy Wood Mackenzie said in September that CBAM is likely to significantly raise the costs of steel imports from India and China.翻译:咨询公司Wood Mackenzie在9月份表示，CBAM可能会大幅提高从印度和中国进口钢材的成本。

India is weighing local tax options to avoid the EU carbon levy after unveiling in May its plan to file a complaint to the World Trade Organization over the EU's carbon tax on imports.翻译:印度在五月份宣布计划就欧盟对进口产品征收的碳税向世界贸易组织提出投诉后，正在考虑采取地方税收方案来避免欧盟征收碳税。

Reporting by Amy Lv and Dominique Patton in Beijing; Editing by Florence Tan and Sonali Paul翻译:吕艾米和多米尼克·巴顿北京报道；编辑：Florence Tan 和 Sonali Paul
item.author: Amy Lv, Dominique Patton

item.title: 中国欧盟商会批评即将举行的上海贸易博览会是“政治展示”
item.description:
The European Union Chamber of Commerce on Friday criticised an upcoming trade fair in China as being more of a "political showcase" than about doing business and pushed for more tangible measures to restore confidence among European companies.翻译:欧盟商会周五批评即将在中国举行的贸易博览会更多的是“政治展示”，而不是做生意，并推动采取更切实的措施来恢复欧洲企业的信心。

Shanghai is due to host the China International Import Expo (CIIE)翻译:） between Nov. 5-10, an annual event launched by President Xi Jinping in 2018 to promote the country's free trade credentials and tackle criticism of its trade surplus with many partners.翻译:上海将于 11 月 5 日至 10 日举办中国国际进口博览会 (CIIE)翻译:），这是习近平主席于 ​​2018 年发起的年度盛会，旨在宣传中国的自由贸易资格，并解决对其与许多合作伙伴的贸易顺差的批评。

Premier Li Qiang is set to address attendees at the event's opening ceremony on Sunday, which is expected to include Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese.翻译:李强总理将于周日在活动开幕式上向与会者发表讲话，预计澳大利亚总理安东尼·阿尔巴内塞将出席。

But the chamber said that contrary to the CIIE's ambitions of boosting China's global imports and showcasing the country's opening up and reform agenda, China's trade surplus with Europe had grown significantly over the past five years.翻译:但该商会表示，与进博会推动中国全球进口、展示中国开放改革议程的雄心相反，过去五年中国对欧洲的贸易顺差大幅增长。

"It's more a government affairs event, more a marketing event and there's been really little said on business. You can say CIIE has become more of a political showcase rather than a business event," Carlo D'Andrea, the chamber's vice president, told reporters at a briefing in Shanghai.翻译:“这更多的是一场政府事务活动，更多的是一场营销活动，关于商业的话题真的很少。可以说，进博会已经更多地成为一场政治展示，而不是商业活动，”中国商会副会长卡洛·德安德里亚(Carlo D'Andrea)翻译:）告诉记者。记者在上海举行吹风会。

"European businesses are becoming disillusioned as symbolic gestures take the place of tangible results needed to restore business confidence," he said.翻译:他表示：“欧洲企业正在幻灭，因为象征性的姿态取代了恢复商业信心所需的切实成果。”

The fair's organisers did not immediately respond to a request for comment. China has said it is willing to take more European exports in response to complaints from the European Union about the lack of a level playing field in China and the politicization of the business environment.翻译:展会组织者没有立即回应置评请求。中国表示愿意接受更多欧洲出口，以回应欧盟对中国缺乏公平竞争环境和商业环境政治化的抱怨。

The EU and China plan a summit by the end of the year. The European Union's top diplomat, Josep Borrell, visited last month, as have several other top EU officials in recent months.翻译:欧盟和中国计划在今年年底前举行峰会。欧盟最高外交官何塞普·博雷尔上个月访问了该国，其他几位欧盟高级官员近几个月也访问了该国。

A survey by the chamber last month that received 116 responses from its members found that participation rates had dropped from 42% to 32% since the first CIIE. Those who had opted not to attend this year after attending previously cited the diminishing value of investment and limited policy changes as among their reasons.翻译:商会上个月进行的一项调查收到了116份会员的回复，发现自首届进博会以来，参与率已从42%下降至32%。那些在参加过之后选择今年不参加的人表示，投资价值下降和政策变化有限是他们的原因。

Although 59% of the survey's respondents said they benefited from government engagement at the show, only a quarter of attendees closed any business deals at last year's CIIE, significantly lower than in 2018 when half of participants closed deals, the chamber added.翻译:该商会补充说，尽管59%的受访者表示他们从政府参与展会中受益，但只有四分之一的与会者在去年的进博会上达成了任何商业交易，显着低于2018年，当时有一半的与会者达成了交易。

European businesses would like to see the CIIE "move away from the politicization" and focus on the business impact, as well as undertake concrete policy measures to open the market alongside the fair, the chamber added.翻译:该商会补充说，欧洲企业希望看到进博会“摆脱政治化”，关注对企业的影响，并在进博会的同时采取具体的政策措施开放市场。

More than 60 countries and three international organisations, as well as 289 of the world's top 500 companies, will be participating in CIIE, according to Chinese state media, including firms such as Micron (MU.O)翻译:）, Nestle and Burberry (BRBY.L)翻译:）翻译:据中国官方媒体报道，超过 60 个国家和三个国际组织以及世界 500 强企业中的 289 家将参加进博会，其中包括美光(MU.O)翻译:） 、雀巢和巴宝莉(BRBY.L )翻译:） 等公司）

Last year, $73.52 billion worth of 'intentional' deals were signed at the fair, up 3.9%.翻译:去年，展会上签署了价值 735.2 亿美元的“意向”交易，增长 3.9%。

($1 = 7.3142 Chinese yuan renminbi)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.3142 人民币）翻译:）

Reporting by Brenda Goh; Editing by Sonali Paul翻译:布伦达·吴报道；索纳利·保罗编辑
item.author: Brenda Goh

item.title: 中国将迎来极端天气年由暖转冷
item.description:
Temperatures in northern China are set to plunge as much as 20 degrees Celsius after the second-warmest October in decades, but warmer-than-usual conditions could soon be back under the influence of El Nino.翻译:在经历了几十年来第二热的10月之后，中国北方的气温预计将骤降20摄氏度，但在厄尔尼诺现象的影响下，气温可能很快就会恢复到高于正常水平的水平。

A stream of cold air entering China on Saturday from the northwest will join one that arrived on Thursday to push temperatures sharply lower, the China Meteorological Administration (CMA)翻译:） said.

In the sparsely populated deserts and grasslands of the northern Inner Mongolia region, temperatures could plummet on Friday and again from Saturday while blizzards could hit the Xinjiang region in the northwest.翻译:内蒙古北部地区人口稀少的沙漠和草原，周五和周六起气温可能会骤降，而西北地区的新疆地区可能会出现暴风雪。

From next week, most of the northeast is expected to see maximum temperatures dive to the single-digits or below freezing as cold air moves east and south, in an abrupt reversal of a recent "big warming", the CMA said.翻译:CMA表示，从下周开始，随着冷空气向东和向南移动，东北部大部分地区的最高气温预计将降至个位数或冰点以下，这是最近“大变暖”的突然逆转。

While freezing temperatures are not uncommon for the time of year, the sudden change is unusual.翻译:虽然一年中的某个时候，气温结冰并不罕见，但突然的变化却是不寻常的。

A few days ago, uncharacteristically warm weather saw parts of northern China post record high temperatures exceeding 30C.翻译:日前，我国北方部分地区出现反常高温，气温超过30℃。

Weather has become more extreme in China in recent years, destroying urban infrastructure as well as farmland, causing hefty economic losses and raising fears about the pace and impact of global warming.翻译:近年来，中国的天气变得更加极端，破坏了城市基础设施和农田，造成了巨大的经济损失，并引发了人们对全球变暖速度和影响的担忧。

This summer, typhoons dumped historic rainfall in inland regions unaccustomed to tropical storms. Typhoon Doksuri caused the worst flooding since 1963 in the Hai river basin that encompasses Beijing, Tianjin and Hebei province.翻译:今年夏天，台风给不习惯热带风暴的内陆地区带来了历史性的降雨。台风“多克苏里”给京津冀海河流域带来了自1963年以来最严重的洪水。

Authorities are due to issue 1 trillion yuan ($137 billion)翻译:） of sovereign bonds to help rebuild areas hit by the floods and improve infrastructure to cope with disasters.

Earlier in the year, northern China basked in unseasonal heat, with temperatures reaching summer-levels, shortly after a very cold January, when the northernmost city of Mohe saw the temperature dip to a record minus 53C.翻译:今年早些时候，中国北方迎来了反季节的高温，在经历了非常寒冷的一月份后不久，最北端城市漠河的气温降至创纪录的零下53摄氏度，气温达到了夏季水平。

Winter this year, however, could be warmer due to a moderate El Nino, Jia Xiaolong, deputy director of China's National Climate Centre, told a press conference on Friday.翻译:然而，中国国家气候中心副主任贾小龙在周五的新闻发布会上表示，由于温和的厄尔尼诺现象，今年的冬季可能会变暖。

El Nino is a natural climate pattern associated with warming of the ocean surface temperatures in the central and eastern Pacific. The phenomenon occurs every two to seven years, lasting nine to 12 months.翻译:厄尔尼诺现象是一种与太平洋中部和东部海洋表面温度变暖有关的自然气候模式。这种现象每两到七年就会发生一次，持续九到十二个月。

"The sea surface temperature in the east-central equatorial Pacific will continue to exceed 0.5C in November, and the El Nino event will persist in the 2023/2024 winter, with a peak intensity of 1.5-2C," Jia said.翻译:“11月赤道中东部太平洋海温将继续超过0.5℃，厄尔尼诺事件将持续到2023/2024年冬季，峰值强度为1.5-2℃。”贾说。

But statistics showed that winter temperatures could fluctuate greatly during El Nino, Jia warned.翻译:但贾警告说，统计数据显示，厄尔尼诺现象期间冬季气温可能会出现大幅波动。

($1 = 7.3127 Chinese yuan renminbi)翻译:）翻译:（1 美元 = 7.3127 人民币）

(This story has been refiled to drop reference to Fahrenheit scale in paragraph 1)翻译:）翻译:（这个故事已被重新提交，以删除第 1 段中对华氏温标的引用）

Reporting by Ethan Wang and Ryan Woo; Editing by Simon Cameron-Moore翻译:西蒙·卡梅伦-摩尔 编辑, Robert Birsel翻译:Ethan Wang 和 Ryan Woo 的报道；编辑：西蒙·卡梅伦-摩尔、罗伯特·伯塞尔
item.author: Ethan Wang, Ryan Woo

item.title: 随着与华盛顿的紧张关系缓和，中国对美国芯片制造商美光科技态度热情
item.description:
China's commerce minister told Micron Technology Inc's (MU.O)翻译:） president Beijing would welcome the U.S. semiconductor company deepening its footprint in the Chinese market, signally a further thaw in relations between the world's top two economies.翻译:中国商务部长告诉美光科技公司(MU.O)翻译:）总裁，北京欢迎这家美国半导体公司加深在中国市场的足迹，这标志着世界两大经济体之间关系的进一步解冻。

In a meeting on Nov. 1, Commerce Minister Wang Wentao told Sanjay Mehrotra, President and CEO of Micron Technology, that China will optimize the environment for foreign investment and provide service guarantees for foreign enterprises, according to a brief statement published on Friday on the commerce ministry's website.翻译:据商务部周五发布的一份简短声明称，商务部部长王文涛在 11 月 1 日的会议上向美光科技总裁兼首席执行官 Sanjay Mehrotra 表示，中国将优化外商投资环境，为外国企业提供服务保障。商务部网站。

"We welcome Micron Technology to continue to take root in the Chinese market and achieve better development under the premise of complying with Chinese laws and regulations," Wang added.翻译:“我们欢迎美光科技继续扎根中国市场，在遵守中国法律法规的前提下取得更好的发展。”王补充道。

The detente comes just months after China's cyberspace regulator said Micron had failed a network security review and barred Chinese operators of key infrastructure from buying from the largest U.S. memory chipmaker.翻译:就在几个月前，中国网络空间监管机构表示美光科技未能通过网络安全审查，并禁止中国关键基础设施运营商从这家美国最大的存储芯片制造商购买产品。

China's move against Micron was widely seen as retaliation for Washington's efforts to restrict Beijing's access to key technology. It came just a day after the Group of Seven (G7)翻译:） rich nations agreed they would look to "de-risk, not decouple" from China, and as Washington pressured its allies to join it in restricting chip equipment exports to China.翻译:人们普遍认为，中国针对美光科技的举动是对华盛顿限制北京获取关键技术的报复。就在一天前，七国集团（G7）富裕国家同意寻求与中国“降低风险，而不是脱钩”，而华盛顿则向其盟友施压，要求其加入限制向中国出口芯片设备的行列。

The Wednesday meeting between Wang and Mehrotra is line with a recent thawing in tensions between Washington and Beijing, as officials from both countries work to organise a meeting between U.S. President Joe Biden and his Chinese counterpart Xi Jinping later this month at the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation summit in San Francisco.翻译:王毅和梅赫罗特拉周三的会面正值华盛顿和北京之间最近紧张局势缓和之际，两国官员正在努力组织美国总统乔·拜登和中国国家主席习近平本月晚些时候在亚太经合组织举行的会晤。旧金山合作峰会。

Reporting by Beijing newsroom; Editing by Sonali Paul and Lincoln Feast翻译:北京新闻编辑室报道；索纳利·保罗和林肯·费斯特编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 随着关系改善，中国葡萄酒市场准备迎接澳大利亚葡萄酒可能回归
item.description:
Summary:
  • Australian Prime Minister Albanese begins visit to China on Saturday翻译:澳大利亚总理阿尔巴内塞周六开始访华
  • First visit by an Australian prime minister since 2016翻译:澳大利亚总理自2016年以来首次访华
  • China put 218% tax on Australian wine in 2021 as ties worsened翻译:随着关系恶化，中国将于2021年对澳大利亚葡萄酒征收218%的税
  • Both sides have agreed to review tariffs, including for wine翻译:双方同意审查关税，包括葡萄酒关税
  • Australian wine could return to the China market early next year if punitive tariffs removed翻译:如果取消惩罚性关税，澳大利亚葡萄酒可能于明年初重返中国市场

News that punitive tariffs on Australian wine introduced by China in 2021 would be reviewed as part of a push to improve the relationship between the two countries was cheered by many, including Campbell Thompson.翻译:作为推动改善两国关系的一部分，中国将于 2021 年对澳大利亚葡萄酒征收惩罚性关税的消息受到了包括坎贝尔·汤普森 (Campbell Thompson) 在内的许多人的欢呼。

The Beijing-based Australian CEO of wine importer and distributor The Wine Republic has spent more than a decade making his living from bringing wine, much of it from Australia, into the China market.翻译:葡萄酒进口商和经销商 The Wine Republic 驻北京的澳大利亚首席执行官十多年来一直靠将葡萄酒（其中大部分来自澳大利亚）引入中国市场谋生。

"We are looking forward to the tariffs being removed. I think for Australia there is definitely an opportunity," he said.翻译:“我们期待取消关税。我认为对澳大利亚来说绝对有机会，”他说。

Late last month, as ties between Beijing and Canberra improved, the two sides announced they had reached a consensus to settle a World Trade Organisation dispute about wine and that anti-dumping tariffs, which weren't set to expire until 2026, would be reviewed.翻译:上个月末，随着北京和堪培拉之间关系的改善，双方宣布已就解决世界贸易组织有关葡萄酒的争端达成共识，并将对将于 2026 年到期的反倾销关税进行审查。

Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese kicks off a visit to China on Saturday, the first visit by a sitting Australian leader since 2016 as the trading partners continue to work on stabilising ties.翻译:澳大利亚总理安东尼·艾博内塞周六开始对中国进行访问，这是澳大利亚在任领导人自 2016 年以来的首次访问，贸易伙伴继续致力于稳定关系。

The introduction of a 218% tax on most Australian wine introduced by China early in 2021 prompted that trade, previously valued as high as $1.2 billion annually, to collapse.翻译:2021年初，中国对大多数澳大利亚葡萄酒征收218%的税，导致此前每年价值高达12亿美元的贸易崩溃。

Penfold's maker, Treasury Wine Estates, said in 2022 it had lost 97% of its China business due to the introduction of the tariffs, it's shares rose more than 5% on news they could soon be removed.翻译:奔富酒庄的制造商富邑葡萄酒集团 (Treasury Wine Estates)翻译:） 表示，2022 年，由于关税的实施，该公司失去了 97% 的中国业务，因关税可能很快被取消的消息，该公司股价上涨了5% 以上。

Prior to Australia's call for an investigation into the origins of COVID-19 in 2020, Australian wines imported into China were subject to zero tariffs following the signing of a free trade agreement in 2015, giving them a 14% tariff advantage over many other wine producing nations.翻译:在澳大利亚于2020年呼吁对COVID-19起源进行调查之前，自2015年签署自由贸易协定以来，进口到中国的澳大利亚葡萄酒实行零关税，比许多其他葡萄酒生产国享有14%的关税优势国家。

Thompson is already in touch with the 10-plus Australian wineries he worked with before 2021, along with some newer players, in expectation that tariffs will soon be removed.翻译:汤普森已经与他在 2021 年之前合作过的 10 多家澳大利亚酒庄以及一些新加入的酒庄取得了联系，预计关税将很快取消。

Though he says this is good news, perhaps paving the way for the return of Australian wine to the Chinese market by early next year, he is not necessarily expecting business to bounce back immediately.翻译:尽管他表示这是个好消息，或许为澳大利亚葡萄酒明年初重返中国市场铺平了道路，但他并不一定期望业务会立即反弹。

"I don't think that's realistic any time soon. However, for a lot of good quality Australian wine producers ... customers still know the wines and I think will re-engage with those wines fairly readily," he said.翻译:“我认为这在短期内不太现实。然而，对于许多优质的澳大利亚葡萄酒生产商来说……顾客仍然了解这些葡萄酒，我认为他们会很容易地重新接触这些葡萄酒，”他说。

Layla Wang, co-owner of Trio Wine Bar in Beijing agreed that Chinese market perceptions of Australian wine haven't changed in the years since it was last available, with no clear winner in the battle to take over Australian wine's market share.翻译:北京 Trio Wine Bar 的合伙人 Layla Wang 也认为，自澳大利亚葡萄酒上次上市以来，中国市场对澳大利亚葡萄酒的看法多年来一直没有改变，在争夺澳大利亚葡萄酒市场份额的争夺战中没有明显的赢家。

The bar's small cellar is lined floor to ceiling with bottles of wine from all over the world, and Wang said the market has become more crowded as people seek out new and different wine experiences, leading to the increased popularity of homegrown Chinese wines, biodynamic and natural options.翻译:酒吧的小酒窖从地板到天花板都摆满了来自世界各地的葡萄酒，王说，随着人们寻求新的、不同的葡萄酒体验，市场变得更加拥挤，导致中国本土葡萄酒、生物动力和葡萄酒越来越受欢迎。自然选择。

"I think even if people have been away from Australian wine for a while, every time we talk about this category of wine, we all think it's a very good quality wine," Wang said, sat at her bar.翻译:“我认为，即使人们已经远离澳大利亚葡萄酒有一段时间了，每次我们谈论这类葡萄酒时，我们都认为这是一种品质非常好的葡萄酒，”王坐在她的酒吧里说道。

"For us, we're definitely delighted as it signifies offering more choices to our customers. For consumers who haven't had Australian wines for years, many will be eager to try them again."翻译:“对我们来说，我们绝对很高兴，因为这意味着为我们的客户提供更多选择。对于多年没有喝过澳大利亚葡萄酒的消费者来说，许多人会渴望再次尝试。”

Editing by Simon Cameron-Moore翻译:西蒙·卡梅伦-摩尔 编辑
item.author: Casey Hall, Xiaoyu Yin

item.title: 随着关系升温，澳大利亚阿尔巴内斯将在中国访问中强调贸易
item.description:
Prime Minister Anthony Albanese will highlight trade as an anchor for stabilising ties when he makes the first visit by an Australian leader to China in seven years, as badly strained relations move back to an even footing, business leaders said.翻译:商界领袖表示，随着澳大利亚领导人七年来首次访华，澳大利亚总理安东尼·艾博内塞将强调贸易是稳定关系的支柱，因为严重紧张的关系已恢复平衡。

Albanese, who arrives on Saturday, will attend the opening of China's top imports fair in Shanghai, and speak to a large business delegation, the following day.翻译:阿尔巴内塞于周六抵达，将出席在上海举行的中国顶级进口博览会的开幕式，并于次日向一个大型商业代表团发表讲话。

He has said he also will raise concerns over rising tension in the South China Sea in a meeting with President Xi Jinping in Beijing on Monday.翻译:他表示，他还将在周一与中国国家主席习近平在北京会面时提出对南海紧张局势升级的担忧。

His government has taken credit for stabilising ties with Australia's largest trading partner since coming to office last year, as China lifted most trade blocks imposed in a 2020 diplomatic dispute that cost A$20 billion in commodity and food exports.翻译:自去年上任以来，他的政府因稳定与澳大利亚最大贸易伙伴的关系而受到赞誉，中国取消了2020年外交争端中施加的大部分贸易封锁，该争端导致大宗商品和食品出口损失200亿澳元。

Even as Australia moves closer to security ally the United States, which has agreed to sell Canberra nuclear-powered submarines under a trilateral defence technology partnership, AUKUS, with Britain, and boosted military exercises, Albanese has emphasised the importance of better dialogue with Beijing.翻译:尽管澳大利亚与安全盟友美国走得更近，美国已同意根据与英国的三边防御技术伙伴关系AUKUS 向堪培拉出售核动力潜艇，并加强军事演习，但阿尔巴内斯仍然强调与北京加强对话的重要性。

"China is the source of our greatest security anxiety ... China is also our largest partner and we do value a productive relationship," Defence Minister Richard Marles told reporters in Washington this week.翻译:“中国是我们最大的安全焦虑的根源......中国也是我们最大的合作伙伴，我们确实重视富有成效的关系，”国防部长理查德·马勒斯本周在华盛顿对记者说。

A quarter of Australia's export earnings come from China, more than the next three trade partners, the United States, South Korea and Japan combined, Albanese said on Tuesday.翻译:阿尔巴内斯周二表示，澳大利亚四分之一的出口收入来自中国，超过了紧随其后的三个贸易伙伴美国、韩国和日本的总和。

"Trade as an anchor provides stability and certainty to allow greater engagement while we navigate uncertain currents and obstacles that lie beneath," said Australia China Business Council president David Olsson.翻译:澳中贸易全国委员会主席戴维·奥尔森 (David Olsson)翻译:） 表示：“贸易作为锚点提供了稳定性和确定性，使我们能够在应对潜在的不确定潮流和障碍的同时进行更多的接触。”

More than 250 Australian companies will exhibit at China's International Import Expo (CIIE)翻译:） in Shanghai, to be opened by Premier Li Qiang on Sunday, showcasing products that were top sellers in China before trade hurdles were imposed - seafood, beef and wine - as well as the iron ore exporters that dominate Australia's trade to China, Fortescue Metals (FMG.AX)翻译:）, Rio Tinto and BHP (BHP.AX)翻译:） .翻译:超过 250 家澳大利亚公司将参加在上海举行的中国国际进口博览会 (CIIE)翻译:），该博览会将于周日由李强总理主持开幕，展示贸易壁垒实施前在中国最畅销的产品——海鲜、牛肉和葡萄酒。作为主导澳大利亚对华贸易的铁矿石出口商，福蒂斯丘金属公司(FMG.AX)翻译:） 、力拓公司和必和必拓(BHP.AX)翻译:） 。

"The prime minister's attendance at CIIE and the signal it sends to the Chinese system and business community, is likely to result in more positive attitudes toward Australia as a trade partner," Olsson said.翻译:奥尔森表示：“总理出席进博会及其向中国体系和商界发出的信号，可能会导致人们对澳大利亚作为贸易伙伴的态度更加积极。”

Chairman of the Business Council of Australia's global engagement committee, Warwick Smith, said Albanese would highlight the complementary nature of bilateral trade in a speech on Sunday to 500 business people.翻译:澳大利亚商业理事会全球参与委员会主席沃里克·史密斯 (Warwick Smith)翻译:） 表示，阿尔巴尼斯将在周日向 500 名商界人士发表的演讲中强调双边贸易的互补性。

"It is important that dialogue has resumed," he said.翻译:“恢复对话很重要，”他说。

DIFFICULT TOPICS

China has lauded the visit's timing, on the 50th anniversary of the first to China by an Australian leader, then Prime Minister Gough Whitlam.翻译:中国对此次访问的时机表示赞赏，适逢澳大利亚领导人、时任总理高夫·惠特拉姆首次访华50周年。

But despite the positive tone, Australian Foreign Minister Penny Wong has said ties won't return to where they were even 15 years ago, when Chinese investment surged into the economy.翻译:但尽管语气积极，澳大利亚外交部长黄英贤表示，两国关系不会回到 15 年前中国投资涌入经济时的水平。

Australia has blocked two Chinese investments in rare earth miners this year on national interest grounds, and in Washington last week, Albanese sought to boost U.S. investment in Australia's minerals sector, to reduce reliance on China.翻译:澳大利亚今年以国家利益为由阻止了中国对稀土矿商的两项投资， 上周在华盛顿，阿尔巴内塞寻求增加美国对澳大利亚矿产行业的投资，以减少对中国的依赖。

China's ambassador, Xiao Qian, in an Australian newspaper column on Friday, said ties were at a "critical juncture of setting off and sailing off again", and urged more cooperation in "such traditional areas as energy, mining, agriculture, education and tourism".翻译:中国大使肖千周五在澳大利亚一家报纸专栏中表示，两国关系正处于“启程和再次扬帆的关键时刻”，并敦促在“能源、矿业、农业、教育和旅游等传统领域开展更多合作” ”。

Asia Society Australia executive director Richard Maude, a former diplomat who wrote Australia's 2017 foreign policy white paper, said the list of difficult topics for the Australian and Chinese leaders was long.翻译:澳大利亚亚洲协会执行董事理查德·莫德（Richard Maude）是澳大利亚2017年外交政策白皮书的前外交官，他表示，澳大利亚和中国领导人面临的难题清单很长。

"The South China Sea and especially China's attempts to force the Philippines off Second Thomas Shoal will have to be high on the agenda, but the prime minister will also need to make it clear that any attempt to force unification with Taiwan will carry severe consequences," said Maude.翻译:“南海问题，特别是中国迫使菲律宾离开仁爱礁的企图必须成为重要议程，但总理还需要明确表示，任何强迫与台湾统一的企图都将带来严重后果， “莫德说。

Although the Albanese government has put dialogue at the centre of its approach to China, most policy remains the same, he said.翻译:他说，尽管阿尔巴尼亚政府已将对话置于其对华政策的核心，但大多数政策保持不变。

"On the defence front, the Albanese government has doubled down on supporting America build the fabric of military deterrence across the Indo-Pacific. That duality of approach is quite evident to China," he said.翻译:“在国防方面，阿尔巴尼亚政府加倍努力支持美国在印度-太平洋地区建立军事威慑结构。这种双重性对中国来说非常明显，”他说。

Reporting by Kirsty Needham; editing by Robert Birsel翻译:科斯蒂·李约瑟报道；罗伯特·伯塞尔编辑
item.author: Kirsty Needham

item.title: 全球金融首脑将在香港峰会上面临更严厉的中国问题
item.description:
Global investment bank and asset manager chiefs are reuniting in Hong Kong next week amid geopolitical tensions and China's economic slowdown, seeking to redefine their position in the world's second-largest economy and its offshore financial hub.翻译:在地缘政治紧张局势和中国经济放缓之际，全球投资银行和资产管理公司高管下周将在香港重聚，寻求重新定义他们在全球第二大经济体及其离岸金融中心的地位。

The Global Financial Leaders Investment Summit, a flagship event hosted by the Hong Kong Monetary Authority, begins on Monday with participants including Goldman Sachs (GS.N)翻译:） Chief Executive David Solomon, Morgan Stanley (MS.N)翻译:） boss James Gorman, Citigroup's (C.N)翻译:） Jane Fraser, as well as HSBC's (HSBA.L)翻译:） Noel Quinn and Standard Chartered's (STAN.L)翻译:） Bill Winters.

The heads of Blackstone Group, Carlyle Group, Citadel and others will also speak at the event, which focuses on the main theme of "living with complexity".翻译:黑石集团、凯雷集团、Citadel 等公司的负责人也将在活动上发表讲话，活动围绕“复杂生活”的主题。

The executives are coming to Hong Kong as the city has shed hundreds of banking and asset management jobs because of the slowdown in China dealmaking and the tightened regulatory grip on the market since the inaugural summit last year. That meeting was billed as Hong Kong's comeback as a global financial hub following the disruptions of the COVID-19 pandemic.翻译:这些高管即将来到香港，因为自去年首届峰会以来，由于中国交易放缓以及对市场的监管收紧，香港已经裁掉了数百个银行和资产管理职位。这次会议被认为是香港在受到新冠肺炎 (COVID-19)翻译:） 大流行破坏后重新成为全球金融中心的标志。

"The main question in the mind of everybody when they come to Hong Kong is how is the Chinese economy performing and what would be the swings coming from there," said Diana Parusheva-Lowery, head of public policy and sustainable finance at the Asia Securities Industry & Financial Markets Association in Hong Kong.翻译:亚洲证券公共政策和可持续金融主管戴安娜·帕鲁舍娃-洛厄里(Diana Parusheva-Lowery)表示：“每个人来到香港时，脑子里的主要问题是中国经济表现如何，以及随之而来的波动是什么。”香港工业及金融市场协会。

The Hong Kong Stock Exchange is only the 11th-largest venue for initial public offerings this year, with merely $2.7 billion raised through the third quarter, a shadow of its top position in most of the last decade. The territory's assets under management fell by 14% in 2022, official data showed.翻译:香港证券交易所仅是今年第 11 大首次公开募股交易场所，第三季度仅筹集了 27 亿美元，与其在过去十年大部分时间里排名第一的地位相形见绌。官方数据显示，2022 年该地区管理的资产下降了 14%。

Trading volumes have also slumped as foreign investors reduce exposure to a China they view as increasingly isolated by its opaque policies, struggling property sector and crackdowns on private enterprise.翻译:由于外国投资者认为中国因不透明的政策、陷入困境的房地产业和对私营企业的打击而日益孤立，因此减少了对中国的投资，交易量也大幅下降。

"The structural slowdown in China's economy, the omnipresent risk that U.S.-China relations might take another leg down in the future, the questions about whether private mainland money now prefers Singapore, none of that has really changed," said Chris Beddor, Gavekal Dragonomics' deputy China research director based in Hong Kong.翻译:龙洲经讯的 Chris Beddor 表示：“中国经济的结构性放缓、中美关系未来可能再次下滑的普遍风险、大陆私人资金现在是否更青睐新加坡的问题，这些都没有真正改变。”驻香港的中国研究副总监。

"And senior people in the financial sector are keenly aware of those issues, even if they don't discuss them publicly," Beddor said.翻译:贝多尔说：“金融领域的资深人士敏锐地意识到这些问题，即使他们没有公开讨论这些问题。”

STRING OF LAYOFFS

Hong Kong's financial job market, which saw an exodus of foreign employees during COVID, is unlikely to recover in the near term amid a challenging operating environment, recruiters and industry insiders say.翻译:招聘人员和业内人士表示，在新冠疫情期间，香港的金融就业市场出现了外籍员工大量外流的情况，但由于经营环境充满挑战，短期内不太可能恢复。

Goldman Sachs, Morgan Stanley and J.P. Morgan have trimmed dozens of bankers based in Hong Kong and mainland China this year, with key China dealmakers among those laid off.翻译:高盛、摩根士丹利和摩根大通今年已裁减了驻香港和中国大陆的数十名银行家，其中包括主要的中国交易撮合者。

The surprise merger between Swiss banking rivals UBS and Credit Suisse resulted in a brutal 80% reduction in the Credit Suisse investment banking staff in Hong Kong in August.翻译:瑞士银行业竞争对手瑞银集团(UBS)和瑞士信贷银行(Credit Suisse)出人意料地合并，导致瑞士信贷银行(Credit Suisse)在香港的投资银行员工8月份大幅裁员80% 。

Canada's largest pension fund CPP Investments also cut a number of Hong Kong-based staff members.翻译:加拿大最大的养老基金CPP Investments也裁减了多名香港员工。

John Mullally, recruiter Robert Walters' Hong Kong managing director, said hiring in private banking remains active, helped by wealth coming out of China to Hong Kong after the border reopened.翻译:招聘人员罗伯特·沃尔特斯(Robert Walters)香港董事总经理约翰·穆拉利(John Mulally)表示，私人银行业的招聘仍然活跃，这得益于边境重新开放后财富从中国流入香港。

Hong Kong needs to be aware of competition from rival financial hub Singapore but Mullally expects Hong Kong to "regain some of the ground lost" despite the depressed dealmaking and trading.翻译:香港需要意识到来自竞争对手金融中心新加坡的竞争，但穆拉利预计，尽管交易和贸易低迷，香港仍将“收复部分失地”。

(This story has been refiled to correct the spelling of CPP Investments in paragraph 13)翻译:）翻译:（本文已重新归档，以更正第 13 段中 CPP Investments 的拼写）

Reporting by Kane Wu in Hong Kong and Scott Murdoch in Sydney; additional reporting by Selena Li and Xie Yu; Editing by Christian Schmollinger翻译:吴凯恩 (Kane Wu) 在香港的报道和斯科特·默多克 (Scott Murdoch) 在悉尼的报道； Selena Li 和 Xie Yu 的补充报道；克里斯蒂安·施莫林格编辑
item.author: Kane Wu, Scott Murdoch

item.title: 财新PMI显示10月中国服务业活动小幅回升
item.description:
China's services activity expanded at a slightly faster pace in October, a private-sector survey showed on Friday, with sales growing at the softest rate in 10 months and employment stagnating as business confidence waned.翻译:周五的一项私营部门调查显示，中国 10 月份服务业活动扩张速度略快，销售增速创 10 个月来最低水平，且随着商业信心减弱，就业停滞。

The vast services sector, which provides about 48% of jobs in China, enjoyed a strong rebound earlier this year but analysts say the sluggish household income growth and uncertain job market raise questions over the sustainability of the industry's growth.翻译:庞大的服务业提供了中国约48%的就业机会，今年早些时候出现了强劲反弹，但分析人士表示，家庭收入增长缓慢和就业市场的不确定性引发了人们对该行业增长可持续性的质疑。

The Caixin/S&P Global services purchasing managers' index (PMI)翻译:） rose to 50.4 in October from September's nine-month low of 50.2. The pace of expansion also remained much slower than seen on average in the first half of the year.

The 50-point mark separates expansion from contraction in activity.翻译:50 分是经济活动扩张与收缩的分界线。

An official survey showed on Tuesday that services PMI dropped to 50.1 from 50.9 in September.翻译:周二的官方调查显示，服务业 PMI 从 9 月份的 50.9 降至 50.1。

"The services sector, which is highly related to youth employment, recovered 90% to pre-COVID levels," said Xing Zhaopeng, senior China strategist at ANZ.翻译:澳新银行高级中国策略师邢兆鹏表示：“与青年就业高度相关的服务业已恢复至新冠疫情前水平90%。”

However, "it is unlikely to see a rebound beyond expectation in the sector," he added.翻译:然而，“该行业不太可能出现超出预期的反弹，”他补充道。

New orders in the services sector last month rose at the weakest pace in 10 months, the Caixin survey showed, offsetting the bump higher from a travel boom seen during the eight-day National Day holiday.翻译:财新调查显示，上个月服务业新订单增速为 10 个月以来最弱，抵消了国庆八天假期旅行热潮带来的增长。

However, there was further improvement in foreign demand for Chinese services amid reports of increased amounts of overseas visitors.翻译:然而，随着海外游客数量的增加，国外对中国服务的需求进一步改善。

The slowdown in sales growth led to companies' more cautious approach to recruitment. Employment in the sector was unchanged in October, having expanded in each of the previous eight months.翻译:销售增长放缓导致企业对招聘采取更加谨慎的态度。该行业的就业人数在 10 月份没有变化，在过去八个月中逐年扩大。

Amid subdued demand, overall optimism slipped for the fourth month in a row and was the lowest since March 2020.翻译:由于需求低迷，整体乐观情绪连续第四个月下滑，为 2020 年 3 月以来的最低水平。

Prices charged by services companies grew at a faster pace as they sought to pass on higher input costs to customers, though the rate of input inflation was the slowest since June 2022.翻译:尽管投入通胀率是 2022 年 6 月以来最慢的，但服务公司寻求将更高的投入成本转嫁给客户，因此其收取的价格增长较快。

Caixin/S&P's composite PMI, which includes both manufacturing and services activity, declined to 50.0 from 50.9 in September, marking the lowest reading since December 2022.翻译:财新/标普综合 PMI（包括制造业和服务业活动）从 9 月份的 50.9 降至 50.0，创下 2022 年 12 月以来的最低读数。

"The market conditions for manufacturing were more sluggish compared with the services sector," said Wang Zhe, economist at Caixin Insight Group.翻译:财新智库经济学家王哲表示：“与服务业相比，制造业的市场状况更加低迷。”

China's economy staged better-than-expected growth in the third quarter, but economists say the weak property sector, fading demand for travel, local government debt and geopolitical tensions may weigh on the outlook.翻译:中国经济第三季度的增长好于预期，但经济学家表示，房地产行业疲软、旅游需求下降、地方政府债务和地缘政治紧张局势可能会给经济前景带来压力。

Reporting by Ellen Zhang and Ryan Woo. Editing by Sam Holmes翻译:张艾伦和吴瑞安报道。山姆·霍姆斯编辑
item.author: Reuters
